Key Match Events: Sri Lanka defeated Pakistan by 5 wickets in the Asia Cup 2022 T20I match on September 9, 2022.
The match was held at Dubai International Stadium.
Sri Lanka won the toss and chose to bowl first.
Pakistan was led by Babar Azam, while Sri Lanka was led by Dasun Shanaka.
Sri Lanka's Pathum Nissanka hit a stunning six.
Sri Lanka's Bhanuka Rajapaksa hit a six.
Pakistan's Mohammad Nawaz hit a huge six but was later run out.
Pakistan's Haris Rauf celebrated the dismissal of Sri Lanka's Danushka Gunathilaka.
Sri Lanka's Dasun Shanaka hit a six.
Sri Lanka's Bhanuka Rajapaksa was dismissed.
Sri Lanka's Dhananjaya de Silva was dismissed.
Pakistan's Mohammad Nawaz hit a much-needed six.
Pakistan was all out for 121 runs in 19.1 overs.
Sri Lanka chased down the target, scoring 124/5 in 17 overs.
